de.hlu.ust
Class Config

java.lang.Object
  de.hlu.ust.Config

public class Config
extends java.lang.Object

Config values, set by web-xml' context-param, java properties or hard coded defaults.

                                         throws AppException

Throws:

updateTo023

public static void updateTo023()
                        throws AppException
Version converting code from 0.2.3 to any later version.

Throws:
AppException - Ever. In case of read or write problems. Or to mark the converting.
